name: The Curse of the King Balrog
name_original: The Curse of the King Balrog
description:
This is a fantasy story about young Hero and his friends. About the Curse and Glory. This is your Destiny!

We created this game under the inspiration of Shining Force series.

Our game have own TBS system that have been made on events only.

P.S. Dear RPG Makers, I'am really sorry for a huge bug in our project. To fix it please download and repalce  CommonEvents.json in The Curse of the King Balrog\www\data folder.
